title: Top Floor 1 BD/1.5BA Loft in Design District w/WD, Parking & Storage
posting_body: Hip & Unique Top Floor 1 Bedroom Loft: 888 7th Street #LL-36
NOTE: unit is still tenant occupied and will be ready for occupancy on September 5th.
Note - NO VIRTUAL SHOWINGS.
ANYONE INTERESTED MUST BE PHYSICALLY PRESENT FOR IN-PERSON VIEWING.
DESCRIPTION:
Bright and spacious top floor condo loft
Hardwood floors throughout the open floor plan
Large floor to ceiling windows overlook peaceful manicured garden
Kitchen features modern stainless steel appliances such as large refrigerator, gas oven and range, dishwasher, garbage disposal, microwave, and ample cabinet space for storage
Large stacked front loading washer and dryer behind shutter doors
Spacious living room with stairs that lead up to loft bedroom
Bedroom is a loft (not fully enclosed) and features tasteful Berber carpet, upstairs toilet and sink, storage area,  views of San Francisco skyline
Spacious bathroom downstairs with shower over tub and half bathroom with toilet and sink upstairs in loft area
Plenty of storage areas throughout the unit including downstairs closet, under stairs area, and upstairs in loft area.
A storage closet in the garage area is also included in rent
One ample sized parking space is included in rent in attached building garage
LOCATION:
Located in the hip Design District where the boarders of SOMA, Mission Bay, and Potrero Hill meet

Walking distance to many restaurants, cafes, and shopping areas including the Grove, Dumpling Time, Trader Joes, Nordstrom Rack, Bed Bath & Beyond, Starbucks, Potrero Hills Whole Foods, Gus’s Market, and 9th& Brannan shops
Walking distance to Cal Train and easy access to multiple muni lines
Blocks from I280, 101, and 80 East freeway on ramps
DETAILS:
No pets
No smoking
One ample size parking space included in rental rate
Tenant pays PG&E; owner pays water and garbage
Tenant pays move in fee of $150 to HOA
The minimum lease term is 12 months
Deposit is 1.5x rent
For more information
Contact Lisa at
show contact info

We support Equal Housing Opportunity and encourage users on our sites and syndicate sites to follow appropriate guidelines to comply with the Fair Housing Act, as well as any applicable state and local regulations.
All renters are hereby informed that all property rental offers are available on an equal opportunity basis.

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
